vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.10;
son of: Bilhan (H1092H);
brother of: Jeush (H3266H), Benjamin (H1144H), Ehud (H0164H), Chenaanah (H3668H), Tarshish (H8659I) and Ahishahar (H0300)
§ Zethan = "olive"
a Benjamite of the sons of Bilhan
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Bilhán; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
細坦 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "橄欖"
一名便雅憫人 (代上 7:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
细坦 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "橄榄"
一名便雅悯人 (代上 7:10)
